alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:30PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Light snow showers continue over Northern Lander and Eureka Counties, along with portions of SW Elko County late this evening... At 1125 PM, the area of snow showers affecting Interstate 80 is mainly focused between Battle Mountain and Valmy where NV Department of Transportation webcams show light snowfall. If traveling between Winnemucca and Elko late this evening, please use caution as a sudden drop in visibility to two miles may be possible, along with light accumulations on roadways. The light snow may produce slick spots - please use caution. The snow showers are expected through 1 AM. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
